Class HttpsRequestHtml

java.lang.Object
com.nsl.web.net.HttpsRequest<String>
com.nsl.web.net.HttpsRequestHtml
public class HttpsRequestHtml extends HttpsRequest<String>
Given URL from the client, an object responsible to send request for HTML page to the URL.

    • setConnection

      protected void setConnection(HttpsURLConnection conn) throws IOException
      Description copied from class: HttpsRequest
      Set connection property. For instance, set content type, or request method.
      Specified by:
      setConnection in class HttpsRequest<String>
      Parameters:
      conn - connection object responsible to connect to the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - is thrown if there is some problem in building connection.

    • storeData

      protected DataContainer<String> storeData(HttpsURLConnection conn, boolean isSuccess) throws IOException
      Description copied from class: HttpsRequest
      Defining how to store data to DataContainer object. Given a connection to the URL, take InputStream from the connection, and get data through the stream.
      Specified by:
      storeData in class HttpsRequest<String>
      Parameters:
      conn - instance which connects
      isSuccess - true if building connection was successful, false if building connection failed, according to the response code.
      Returns:
      a data container which contains the resource.
      Throws:
      IOException - is thrown if there is some problem in the InputStream received from HttpsURLConnection.
